title: play button gone
body:
PLZZZ help.
so when it showed plz wait for your game to download to do the battle turtorial. it took long so i didnt do it but then when im in the home of the app the play or start matc button isnt there and stuf plzzzzzzzzzzzzzz help

replies.body:
That Play button will turn grey sometimes if the client can't detect a stable connection that would allow you to stay in the game without disconnecting. I'd first try out an ethernet connection if at all possible since that can almost guarantee a stable connection, but you should also check to make sure none of your firewalls or antivirus's are blocking your network from reaching our servers. 

Be sure to check out those steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you're not familiar with them!
Try to reinstall the game. It might help.
